name: Under the Sea (Rodrigo Antunes)
description:
"All that glistens are not gold." by this phrase we mean watch out!
To move use the WASD keys, to move up and down use the up and down arrows.

Thanks for playing!
Follow us:

if you like it and can donate, will help us to continue this project and live creating games :D
